isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - CYLINDER HEAD OR REPLACE GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: CYLINDER HEAD OR REPLACE GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE

step1.para: Install wheel chocks, drain cooling system and disconnect battery.
Remove engine cover & housing.
Remove charge air cooler intake hose.
Remove Exhaust Back Pressure Sensor (EBPS) , tube & mount bracket assembly.
Disconnect EGR cooler deairation hose from cooler.
Disconnect air compressor inlet hose from air compressor.
Disconnect serpentine belt.
Remove alternator mount bolts, disconnect alternator wiring and remove alternator from vehicle.
Disconnect CAM, IAT, ECT, ECL & turbocharger wiring and reposition harness.
Disconnect fan hub air hose from fan hub (if equipped).
Disconnect air intake heater element wiring & EGR valve wiring.
Disconnect charge air cooler outlet hose from mixer duct.
Remove air intake mixer duct & EGR valve assembly.
Remove EGR cooler coolant return pipe.
Remove EGR cooler & crossover pipe as an assembly.

note.para: Includes remove EGR cooler coolant supply pipe

step1.para: Disconnect high pressure oil pump discharge hose from cylinder head.
Disconnect all wiring from valve cover gasket.
Remove crankcase ventilation filter.
Remove fuel filter assembly.
Remove engine coolant thermostat.
Disconnect heater hose & deairation hose from water manifold.
Disconnect fan clutch and blade assembly and gently rest it against the cooling package.

note.para: Position a piece of cardboard in front of radiator to prevent damage if necessary

step1.para: Remove valve cover and gasket.
Remove high pressure oil manifold and all fuel injectors.
Remove rocker arm shaft assembly, valve bridges and push rods.
Loosen turbocharger outlet pipe clamp.
Remove all exhaust manifold mount bolts and let exhaust manifold & turbocharger assembly rest against bus body.
Remove bolt holding rear engine lift bracket to air intake heater relay bracket.
Remove Exhaust Back Pressure Sensor (EBPS) tube fitting from exhaust manifold.
Raise vehicle to manuever cylinder head lifting device if necessary.
Remove cylinder head bolts and remove cylinder head from vehicle.
Remove engine lifting brackets & water manifold from cylinder head.
Remove air intake manifold and fan hub if replacing cylinder head.
Tap cylinder block head bolt holes as needed.
Clean cylinder block, head and exhaust manifold mating surfaces.
Clean and check cylinder head bolt threads for re-use using special gauge (ZTSE4667).
Check cylinder block and head mating surfaces for warpage.
Check cylinder head thickness if necessary.
Pressure test cylinder head for leaks.
Install air intake manifold & fan hub to cylinder head if necessary.
Install engine lifting brackets & water manifold to cylinder head.
Position engine assembly #1 cylinder to TDC on compression stroke.
Install cylinder head to vehicle.
Lower vehicle if it was initially raised to manuever liftng device.
Install cylinder head bolts and torque to spec.
Install Exhaust Back Pressure Sensor (EBPS) tube fitting to exhaust manifold.
Install bolt holding rear engine lift bracket to air intake heater relay bracket.
Install exhaust manifold mount bolts & torque to spec.
Tighten turbocharger outlet pipe clamp.
Install push rods, valve bridges & rocker arm shaft assembly and torque to spec.
Replace all fuel injector o-rings.
Install all fuel injectors.
Replace high pressure oil manifold o-rings and seals.
Install high pressure oil manifold & torque to spec.
Adjust valves & engine brake if equipped.
Install valve cover & gasket.

note.para: Do not tighten at this time

step1.para: Connect fan clutch and fan blade assembly to fan hub.
Connect heater hose & deairation hose to water manifold.
Install thermostat and upper radiator pipe.
Install fuel filter assembly and connect fuel lines and wiring.
Prime fuel system.
Install crankcase ventilation filter.
Connect fuel injector wiring to valve cover gasket.

note.para: Do not connect the fuel injector connector that passes through the mixer duct at this time.

step1.para: Connect high pressure oil pump discharge hose to cylinder head.
Install air intake manifold mixer duct & EGR valve assembly and connect CAC hose to mixer duct.

note.para: Connect the fuel injector connector that passes through mixer duct at this time

step1.para: Connect EGR valve & air intake heater element wiring.
Install EGR cooler & crossover pipe assembly.

note.para: Includes install EGR cooler coolant supply pipe

step1.para: Install EGR cooler coolant return pipe.
Connect fan hub air hose to fan hub (if equipped).
Connect CAM, IAT, ECT, ECL & turbocharger wiring.
Install alternator & connect wiring.
Connect serpentine belt.
Connect air compressor inlet hose to air compressor.
Connect EGR cooler deairation hose to cooler.
Install Exhaust Back Pressure Sensor (EBPS) , tube & mount bracket assembly.
Install charge air cooler intake hose.
Fill cooling system & perform cooling system pressure test.
Connect battery, start engine and verify correct operation.
Install valve cover mount bolts & torque to spec.
Secure engine wiring harnesses with tie straps as needed.
Install engine housing & cover.
Remove wheel chocks.
